Tropic Vitamin Toner Pore-Refining Mist, Unscented

Brand: Tropic

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: aloe barbadensis leaf juice powder, lactobacillus ferment, betaine, dimethyl sulfone, sodium PCA, propanediol, glycerin, hydrogenated persea gratissima oil, cucumis sativus fruit water, panthenol, polyepsilon-lysine, hydrogenated vegetable

rogenated vegetable oil, squalane, sodium hyaluronate, phospholipids, niacinamide, ascorbyl glucoside, raphanus sativus seed extract, camellia sinensis leaf extract, gluconolactone, tocopheryl acetate, vaccinium macrocarpon extract, rosa centifolia flower extract

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LO
Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
